text: Charles Hannaford (8 January 1896 – July 1970) was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Finsbury Park, London. He played for Maidstone United, Millwall, Charlton Athletic, Clapton Orient, and Manchester United. ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1896 births Category:1970 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Maidstone United F.C. title: Charlie Hannaford
